definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]

sentences.english: When Bertha came up to him he put her gently aside.
sentences.chinese: 當伯莎來到他身邊時，他輕輕地把她推在一旁。

sentences.english: The imagined grief was so poignant that Bertha burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 想象的悲慟是如此強烈，使伯莎淚如泉湧。

sentences.english: Bertha found it possible to look back upon the past with something like amusement.
sentences.chinese: 伯莎發現可以象逗趣一般地回憶某些往事。

sentences.english: His obvious dislike to the suggestion cut Bertha's heart.
sentences.chinese: 他對伯莎的提議的明顯不喜歡，傷了她的心。

sentences.english: Bertha repressed her gaiety and began to eat .
sentences.chinese: 伯莎抑止住逗樂的情緒，開始喫飯。

sentences.english: She was also curious, and would have given much to find out the cause of Bertha's outburst .
sentences.chinese: 她還好奇，她將竭盡全力探出伯莎悲哀發作的原因。

sentences.english: No, Bertha, if you're an atheist I can have nothing more to do with you.
sentences.chinese: 不，伯莎，如果你是個無神論者，我不能再和你交往。

sentences.english: They kept silence for a moment, and then an idea seized Bertha.
sentences.chinese: 他們沉默了一陣子，然後伯莎心生一念。

sentences.english: Sometimes Bertha wandered to the sea-shore and looked across the desolate waste of water.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾伯莎去海岸上閒逛，眺望荒涼的水域。

sentences.english: By this time Bertha was frightened out of her wits.
sentences.chinese: 伯莎這時已恐慌得驚惶失措。

sentences.english: He walked along with the free-and-easy stride that Bertha so much admired.
sentences.chinese: 他用伯莎所極爲欣賞的那種不拘形式的大步往前走去。

sentences.english: Bertha loved the calm of winter.
Bertha's solitary walk was to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 伯莎孑然一身散步的道路是通向海邊的。

sentences.english: Bertha would eventually become the dutiful and submissive spouse.
sentences.chinese: 伯莎最終會成爲那種本分馴良的妻子。

sentences.english: Bertha's father resolved to consult his man of business.
sentences.chinese: 伯莎的父親決定諮詢他的法律顧問。

sentences.english: The spirit of Bertha is not quite so easily subdued.
sentences.chinese: 而對社會原因造成的“伯莎”悲劇不太容易扭轉。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
